name: Miniavs - Free Avatar Creator
description:
ðŸ‘‹ Welcome to Miniavs!


Miniavs is super easy to use as an avatar builder, which will help you create your super-cool character.


Mix any part or change the colors to match your personality.


It is very useful for applications, especially for those with a younger user base, whether as a creative feature or just to preserve your anonymity.


We love to create, and most of all to share. This is why we want to transform these freebies into a beautiful series. Each week we will post a new design file for different purposes.


Stay in the loop! Check our website and our Dribbble accounts for updates.
